mapper.sql: `id` AS id, `user_id` AS userId, `rival_user_id` AS rivalUserId, `entrust_id` AS entrustId, `rival_entrust_id` AS rivalEntrustId, `amount` AS amount, `price` AS price, `count` AS count, `rate` AS rate, `fees` AS fees, `currency_trade_id` AS currencyTradeId, `is_active` AS isActive, `entrust_direction` AS entrustDirection, `create_time` AS createTime
